alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 5:17PM EDT until April 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Colleton County in southeastern South Carolina... Dorchester County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 516 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Lodge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Saint George, Reevesville, Smoaks, Lodge, Padgetts and Ashton. This warning includes the following interstates: I-26 between mile markers 171 and 177. I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 76 and 85. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
